Utility class for downloading files.

download

public static void download(URL url,
                            File destination,
                            ProgressListener listener)
                     throws IOException

Downloads url to destination without altering the data.

Deletes destination on failure.

listener - Optional progress listener.

Deletes destination on failure.

Downloads url to destination and gunzips data on the fly.

Deletes destination on failure.

Parameters:

listener - Optional progress listener.
